heading: Reinstatement fees
text:
The fees required for the reinstatement of a certificate of competence or license, plate or seal
   after suspension shall be the same as those required to obtain an original document. If reinstatement of the certificate of
   competence, license, plate or seal is not requested within 30 days of the lifting of the suspension, then late fees shall be imposed in
   accordance with article 119 of chapter 1 of this title.
